General.Name: Urban Barns Foods Inc
General.Description: Urban Barns Foods Inc. operates as a produce production company in the United States. It intends to supply organic and conventional fruits and vegetables, such as lettuce, basil, and various herbs for urban consumers. The company is based in Mirabel, Canada.
General.Address: 13,000 Chemin Bélanger, Mirabel, QC, Canada, J7J 2N8

3.Name: Mr. Talal  Thabet
3.Title: Head of Middle East & North Africa Investments
